name: socialconnect
description: Modern real-time social media platform with React, Express, and MongoDB

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=authentication && npm install --workspace=backend && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=shared
scripts.build:all: npm run build --workspace=shared && npm run build --workspace=authentication && npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules authentication/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules shared/node_modules

author: SocialConnect Team
